text:
Bad dining experience. No cutlery.  Knife very blunt, resulting to Bad shape pizza. We have to resort to use hand to pull manually (pictures tell a hundred words.)

Orders hashbrown, miss our 1 box. Have to keep reminding kitchen staff of the shortage. Bad Bad baddddddddd

After reading reviews about the service here was a little skeptical to try this place out ...but was greeted with a smile and treated well at the counter , the person at the counter was very polite and tried explaining a every  small doubts...
but when it comes to the Pizza, can't say the same ... Cheese was so sparsely used , and the crust was dry too .. The Pizza as a whole lacked flavour but it was decent on the portion size !
The Pizza station was however not looking that organized and tidy ...
The store mostly concentrates on takeaways rather than dine-in and the person at the counter informed before hand

I would like to commend Rina at Pizza Hut for her exceptional service during my recent visit. My husband and I were quite confused by the ongoing promotion, but she patiently explained everything to us without showing any frustration, even when it took us a while to decide. Her cheerful demeanor and lighthearted jokes made the experience even more pleasant. I truly appreciate Rina's patience and positive attitude, which made our visit enjoyable. Great customer service like hers deserves recognition!

Have yet to try the food, but i think Rina‚Äôs service just deserve the 5 stars ‚ú®

Half doing my order. I order pizza and melts, and the app lets me to wait 12 minutes. When I collect my food after 30 minutes, they just forgot to do my melts and let me to wait for another 9 minutes. Please improve next time and they have already store my pizza in the bag already. So please check whether the order is fully done before store.

Pizza Hut in Wisteria Mall truly stands out! Her attention to detail and dedication to ensuring every concern is addressed made our experience so smooth and enjoyable. She‚Äôs a friendly face who goes the extra mile to make everyone feel welcome. Big shoutout to Irish for her amazing service, thank you!!!! ü´∂üèªü´∂üèª
